frontMatter.title: Radxa X4L: A Pocket-Sized Powerhouse
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: A powerful pocket-sized PC featuring the Intel N100 processor, dual 32-bit LPDDR5 memory channels, and versatile OS support. Ideal for home automation, virtualization, and portable computing.
